titles.title: Supporting the goals and ideals of National Celiac Awareness Month, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

bill.summary: 5/4/2011--Introduced. Expresses support for: (1) the goals and ideals of National Celiac Awareness Month, and (2) working toward an eventual cure for celiac disease through increased research and treatment. Recognizes: (1) that awareness of celiac disease will have a significant positive impact on the quality of life of people with that disease, and (2) the importance of improving diagnosis rates through increased education about the disease.
